amendment.description: To provide emergency assistance for disaster response and recovery, and for other expenses, directly related to Hurricanes Laura, Delta, and Zeta.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2210, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 79. Record Vote Number: 300.

action.text: Amendment SA 2210 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5796, S5803-5804; text: CR S5796) To provide emergency assistance for disaster response and recovery, and for other expenses, directly related to Hurricanes Laura, Delta, and Zeta.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2210 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 2137.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2210, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 79. Record Vote Number: 300.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2210, under the order of 8/4/2021, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 19 - 79. Record Vote Number: 300.
